text: The men's 400 metres event at the 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Sydney, Australia, at International Athletic Centre on 21, 22 and 23 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Obea Moore ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Jerome Davis ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Shane Niemi ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 23 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
